org.apache.drill.exec.vector

Class BitVector.Mutator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.exec.vector.BaseValueVector.BaseMutator
      • org.apache.drill.exec.vector.BitVector.Mutator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueVector.Mutator
    Enclosing class:
    BitVector

    public class BitVector.Mutator
extends BaseValueVector.BaseMutator
    MutableBit implements a vector of bit-width values. Elements in the vector are accessed by position from the logical start of the vector. Values should be pushed onto the vector sequentially, but may be randomly accessed. NB: this class is automatically generated from ValueVectorTypes.tdd using FreeMarker.

      • setValueCount

        public final void setValueCount(int valueCount)
        Description copied from interface: ValueVector.Mutator
        Sets the number of values that is stored in this vector to the given value count. WARNING! Once the valueCount is set, the vector should be considered immutable.
        Parameters:
        valueCount - value count to set.
